name: Iron Impact
description: Iron Impact is a tank TDS similar to many of the NES games we loved so much when we were kids, such as Battle City or Jackal.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista Processor: Dual Core 2.0 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 512 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 7 or later Processor: Dual Core 3.0+ GHz or higher Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 MB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Man, the retro graphics theme going on had me attached to this baby instantly, I love to recall the good old memories when I was a kid. It's a simple, yet short, TDS game, levels get increasingly difficult, even on the easiest setting.  8/10
